## Test setting

For the test you must be able to run

```{r}
# install Rcpp
# library("Rcpp")
# library("RcppArmadillo")
```

```{r}
setwd("~/git/mixsqp")
# install Rcpp
library("Rcpp")
library("RcppArmadillo")
#sourceCpp("temp.cpp")
sourceCpp("mixSQP.cpp")
convtol = 1e-8; ptol = 1e-10; eps = 1e-8; sptol = 1e-3; maxiter = 100; maxqpiter = 100; verbose = F;
mixSQP_rcpp = function(L){
  x0 = rep(1,dim(L)[2])/dim(L)[2];
  mixSQP(L, x0, convtol, ptol, eps, sptol, maxiter, maxqpiter, verbose)$x
}
```

```{r}
library("REBayes")
library("rjulia")
library("microbenchmark")
```

```{r}
source("testdata.R")
source("testfunctions.R")
```

```{r}
set.seed(2018)
L = testdata(1e3,10)
print(cbind(x_rebayes = REBayes(L), x_julia = mixSQP_julia(L),
            x_rcpp = mixSQP_rcpp(L)), digits = 3)
```
